(2,): As a FABS application user, I want to upload and validate submissions, so that I can ensure the data meets required standards As a developer, I want to update validation rules, so that I can adapt to changing requirements and ensure data integrity As a file manager, I want to generate FABS reports, so that I can provide detailed insights based on submitted data
